description: Returns the child event of a specific given ManagedNotificationEvent.

parameters.name: arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the ManagedNotificationChildEvent to return.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the resource.

nested_items.name: managedNotificationConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the ManagedNotificationConfiguration associated with the ManagedNotificationChildEvent.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The creation time of the ManagedNotificationChildEvent.

nested_items.name: schemaVersion
nested_items.description: The schema version of the Managed Notification Child Event.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for a Managed Notification Child Event.

nested_items.name: messageComponents
nested_items.description: Describes the components of a notification message.

nested_items.name: headline
nested_items.description: A sentence long summary. For example, titles or an email subject line.

nested_items.name: paragraphSummary
nested_items.description: A paragraph long or multiple sentence summary. For example, Chatbot notifications.

nested_items.name: completeDescription
nested_items.description: A complete summary with all possible relevant information.

nested_items.name: dimensions
nested_items.description: A list of properties in key-value pairs. Pairs are shown in order of importance from most important to least important. Channels may limit the number of dimensions shown to the notification viewer.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the dimension.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the dimension.

nested_items.name: sourceEventDetailUrl
nested_items.description: The source event URL.

nested_items.name: sourceEventDetailUrlDisplayText
nested_items.description: The detailed URL for the source event.

nested_items.name: notificationType
nested_items.description: The type of event causing the notification.
Values:
ALERT.
A notification about an event where something was triggered, initiated, reopened, deployed, or a threshold was breached.
WARNING.
A notification about an event where an issue is about to arise. For example, something is approaching a threshold.
ANNOUNCEMENT.
A notification about an important event. For example, a step in a workflow or escalation path or that a workflow was updated.
INFORMATIONAL.
A notification about informational messages. For example, recommendations, service announcements, or reminders.

nested_items.name: eventStatus
nested_items.description: The assesed nature of the event.
Values:
HEALTHY.
All EventRules are ACTIVE.
UNHEALTHY.
Some EventRules are ACTIVE and some are INACTIVE.

nested_items.name: aggregateManagedNotificationEventArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the ManagedNotificationEvent that is associated with this Managed Notification Child Event.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The notification event start time.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The end time of the event.

nested_items.name: textParts
nested_items.description: A list of text values.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of text part. Determines the usage of all other fields and whether or not they're required.

nested_items.name: displayText
nested_items.description: A short single line description of the link. Must be hyper-linked with the URL itself.

nested_items.name: textByLocale
nested_items.description: A map of locales to the text in that locale.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: url
nested_items.description: The URL itself.

nested_items.name: organizationalUnitId
nested_items.description: The Organizational Unit Id that an Amazon Web Services account belongs to.

nested_items.name: aggregationDetail
nested_items.description: Provides detailed information about the dimensions used for event summarization and aggregation.

nested_items.name: summarizationDimensions
nested_items.description: Properties used to summarize aggregated events.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the SummarizationDimensionDetail.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: Value of the property used to summarize aggregated events.
